actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for the relief of Joyce G. McFarland.

summary.text: Directs that a named individual shall be deemed to have elected on a specified date, to have waived entitlement to military retired pay and to have received in lieu thereof a civil service retirement annuity. Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay, from the Civil Service Retirement and Disability Fund, to: (1) the Secretary of the Air Force a specified amount equal to such individual's military retired pay; and (2) the surviving spouse of such individual a specified amount equal to such individual's civil service retirement annuity, less sums previously paid.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Joyce G. McFarland.
